body:
Comment 3 by **julien.laffaye**: 
Here is the traceback with GOTRACEBACK=2:

throw: bad m->nextg in nextgoroutine

goroutine 2 [syscall]:
runtime.throw(0x82c3329, 0x8080f2c)
	/work/a/ports/lang/go/work/go/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.c:114 +0x40
nextgandunlock()
	/work/a/ports/lang/go/work/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:643 +0x1da
schedule(0x382f0000, 0x382f0000)
	/work/a/ports/lang/go/work/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:896 +0xb2
runtime.mcall(0x382f0000, 0x0)
	/work/a/ports/lang/go/work/go/src/pkg/runtime/asm_386.s:174 +0x3a
created by runtime.main
	/work/a/ports/lang/go/work/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:221

goroutine 1 [runnable]:
runtime.gosched()
	/work/a/ports/lang/go/work/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:927 +0x4d
runtime.exitsyscall()
	/work/a/ports/lang/go/work/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:1029 +0x67
syscall.Syscall()
	/work/a/ports/lang/go/work/go/src/pkg/syscall/asm_freebsd_386.s:28 +0x32
syscall.Stat(0x382b69c0, 0x27, 0x3830a420, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/syscall/zsyscall_freebsd_386.go:1010 +0x55
os.Stat(0x382b69c0, 0x27, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/os/file_unix.go:121 +0x51
os/exec.findExecutable(0x382b69c0, 0x27, 0x21, 0x819c880)
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/os/exec/lp_unix.go:19 +0x29
os/exec.LookPath(0x81a097c, 0x5, 0x382ea360, 0x382ff208)
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/os/exec/lp_unix.go:51 +0x205
main.init()
	/usr/local/go/src/cmd/go/bootstrap.go:1314 +0x421
runtime.main()
	/work/a/ports/lang/go/work/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:234 +0x6a
runtime.goexit()
	/work/a/ports/lang/go/work/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:271
